name: WNDCHARM-ROI-Alpha00
title: Multi-threaded WND-CHARM with ROI Capability
description: Multi-threaded WND-CHARM with support for Region of Interest (ROI)
author: Mahdi Maghrebi
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: DataPath
inputs.description: The full path to input tiled-tiff image (Required except for Morphological features)

inputs.name: LabeledData
inputs.description: The full path to input tiled-tiff mask for ROI computations (Optional)

inputs.name: DesiredFeatures
inputs.description: The desired set of features to be computed

inputs.name: ImageTransformationName
inputs.description: The desired algorithm for image transformation (Optional)

inputs.name: PixelsUnitConversion
inputs.description: Optional pixel's unit conversion (for Morphological features only)

outputs.name: output
outputs.description: The path to the directory containing the computed features

ui.title: Input tiled-tiff image
ui.description: Insert the path to the image collection (Required except for Morphological features)

ui.title: Input tiled-tiff mask for ROI computations (Optional)
ui.description: Insert the path to the image collection

ui.title: The desired feature sets for computation
ui.description: Select the desired feature(s) for computation

ui.title: Desried image transformation algorithm
ui.description: Select the desired Image Transformation algorithm

ui.title: Desired feature extraction algorithm
ui.description: Select the desired feature extraction algorithm

ui.title: Optional pixel's unit conversion (for Morphological features only)
ui.description: Enter a value for the pixel's unit convertion (Default value: 1)
